title: Bug 116564 - Title of hyperlink builder changes with settings
OB: When the hyperlink builder is opened and the user clicks on 'OK', then reopens the hyperlink builder:
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder changes to 'www.actuate.com' instead of 'Hyperlink Options'.
SR:
1. Open the hyperlink builder.
2. Click on 'OK'.
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
